tasks.label: Git: Smart Commit
args: git add . && git commit -m "chore: automated commit $(date +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')"

tasks.label: Git: Commit with AI-style message
args:
git add . && git commit -m "feat: update OpenShift automation playbooks

- Enhanced MAC address allocation logic
- Improved consistency across deployment scripts
- Fixed indexing issues in worker node creation

Signed-off-by: $(git config user.name) <$(git config user.email)>"

tasks.label: Git: Status & Diff
args: echo '=== Git Status ===' && git status && echo '' && echo '=== Git Diff ===' && git diff --color=always

tasks.label: Git: Add & Commit Interactive
args: echo 'Files changed:' && git status --porcelain && echo '' && read -p 'Enter commit message: ' msg && git add . && git commit -m "$msg"

tasks.label: Git: Commit Fix
args: echo 'Files changed:' && git status --porcelain && echo '' && read -p 'Describe the fix: ' desc && git add . && git commit -m "fix: $desc"

tasks.label: Git: Commit Feature
args: echo 'Files changed:' && git status --porcelain && echo '' && read -p 'Describe the feature: ' desc && git add . && git commit -m "feat: $desc"

tasks.label: Git: Commit Update
args: echo 'Files changed:' && git status --porcelain && echo '' && read -p 'Describe the update: ' desc && git add . && git commit -m "update: $desc"
